com.misfit.misfitsdk.callback

Interface MFStreamingCallback

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MFGestureCallback

    public interface MFStreamingCallback

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onGestureReceived(MFGesture gesture)
      It will be called when has received gesture from device
      void onHeartbeatReceived()
      It will be called when received a hear beat signal every 10 seconds indicating the connection between the phone and the device is OK.

    • Method Detail

      • onGestureReceived

        void onGestureReceived(MFGesture gesture)
        It will be called when has received gesture from device
        Parameters:
        gesture - the gesture received, refer to MFGesture

      • onHeartbeatReceived

        void onHeartbeatReceived()
        It will be called when received a hear beat signal every 10 seconds indicating the connection between the phone and the device is OK.
        App can stop the connection if not receiving heat beat signal for too much long time.
